steps.question: This green thing stays up all year. It has lights and branches. We put decorations on it. What is it?
steps.followUp: Look carefully inside the Christmas tree branches.

steps.question: Find a unicorn and take a picture of it.
steps.followUp: Look near the giraffe stuffed toy.

steps.question: Look for a blue shoe and take a picture of it.
steps.followUp: Look near where kid shoes go.

steps.question: Letâ€™s build with paper. Make two triangles. One must be blue. One must be yellow. Take a picture of them.
Team challenge. Solve one big puzzle together and take a picture of it.
Do 5 jumping jacks as a team. Then smile big and take a picture.
Use Lego to build the letter M. Capital M. Take a picture of it.
steps.followUp: Look inside the big Lego city box.

steps.question: I am round. I roll. I bounce. Kids like to play with me. What am I?
Draw a happy Easter egg. It must have a face. Take a picture of your drawing.
Make an Easter egg with two different colors and take a picture of it.
Congrats, you found everything. Now look where the vacuum hides to find your gift.
